questions.question: What is the definition of an Adjective?

choices.answer: A word, phrase, or clause to describe a noun or pronoun.
A word, phrase, or clause to describe a noun.
A word, phrase, or clause to describe a pronoun.
A word or phrase to describe a noun.

questions.question: What is the definition of an Adverb.

choices.answer: Words, phrase, clause that changes the meaning of a verb.
Words, phrase, clause that changes the meaning of verb, adjective, adverb.
Words, phrase, clause that changes the meaning of an adjective.
Words, phrase, clause that changes the meaning of other advarbs.
The noun to which a pronoun reflects.
The noun phrase to which a pronoun reflects.
The noun or noun phrase to which a pronoun changes.
The noun or noun phrase to which a pronoun reflects.

questions.question: What is the definition of an Antecedent?

choices.answer: A noun that identifies/modifies the noun/pronoun before it.
A noun phrase that identifies/modifies the noun/pronoun before it.
A noun/noun phrase that identifies/modifies the noun/pronoun before it.
A noun/noun phrase that modifies the noun/pronoun before it.

questions.question: What is the definition of an Appositive?

choices.answer: A type of adverb used to identify specificity.
A type of adjective used to identify specificity.
A type of verb used to identify specificity.
A type of noun used to identify specificity.

questions.question: What is the definition of an Article?

choices.answer: An irregualar verb that provides information abount a noun.
An irregular noun that provides information about a verb.
A irregular noun that provides information about another noun.
An irregular verbs that provides information about another verb.

questions.question: What is the definition of an Auxiliary?

choices.answer: Property of nouns that show how it relates to other bits of a sencence.
Property of pronouns that show how it relates to other bits of a sentence.
Property of nouns/pronouns do show how it relates to other bits of sentence
Property of verbs that show how it relates to other bits of a sentence.

questions.question: What is the definition of a Case?
What is the definition of a Collective Noun?

choices.answer: A court noun referring to a group.
A noun referring to a group.
A verb referring to a group.
A court verb referring to a group.
Indicating something has a quality to greater change something.
Indicating that something has a quality to lesser change something.
Indicating that something has been changed.
Indicating that something has a quality to greater/lesser change something.

questions.question: What is the definition of a Comparative?

choices.answer: A word that completes the meaning of a verb.
A phrase that completes the meaning of a verb.
A word or phrase that complete the meaning of a verb.
A word or phrase that complete the meaning of a noun.

questions.question: What is the definition of Complement?

choices.answer: A word or phrase that links words, phrases, clauses or sentences.
A phrase that links words, phrases, clauses or sentences.
A word that links words, phrases, clauses or sentences.
A word or phrase that links phrases, clauses or sentences.

questions.question: What is the definition of Conjunction?

choices.answer: An noun that functions as a conjunction.
An adverb that functions as a conjunction.
An verb that functions as a conjunction.
An adjective that functions as a conjunction.

questions.question: What is the definition of a Conjunctive adverb?
What is the definition of Conventional?

choices.answer: Abbreviation of a phrase formed by amiting letters with a apostrophe.
Abbreviation of a word formed by amiting letters with a apostrophe.
Abbreviation of words/phrase formed by amiting letters with a apostrophe.
Abbreviation of a sentence formed by amiting letters with a apostrophe.

questions.question: What is the definition of Conventional?

choices.answer: Significantly more common than alternative forms.
More common than alternative forms.
Significantly more common than the same forms.
More common than the same forms.

questions.question: What is the definition of a count noun?

choices.answer: A verb that be singular or plural.
A noun that be singular or plural.
A noun that be singular.
A noun that be plural.
Modifier, especially at the start of a sentence to change no words
Modifier, especially at the start of a sentence to change bad words
Modifier to change bad words/no words
Modifier,especially at the start of a sentence,to change bad words/no words

questions.question: What is the definition of a dangler (or dangler modifier)?

choices.answer: A noun/pronoun referring to people/things acted upon by the action of verbs
A pronoun referring to people/things acted upon by the action of verbs
A noun/pronoun referring to people acted upon by the action of verbs
A noun referring to people/things acted upon by the action of verbs

questions.question: What is the definition of a Direct Objective?

choices.answer: The person of a clause when the speaker is speaking about someone else.
When the speaker is speaking about themself.
The person of a clause when the speaker is speaking about the reader.
The person of a clause when the speaker is speaking about themself.

questions.question: What is the definition of a First Person view point?
What is the definition of a Ground?

choices.answer: an-ing verb.
an-ing verb that functions as a noun.
an-ing noun.
an-ing noun that functions as a verb.
Rules needed to know in order to form sentences in a language.
Rules needed to know in order to completely form words in a language.
Rules needed to know in order to completely form sentences in a language.
Rules needed to know in order to form words in a language.

questions.question: What is the definition of Grammar?
